element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm classifies features in a vector layer into a given number of classes, using the values of several variables associated with those features.

element.name: LAYER
element.text: The input layer with features to classified.

element.name: FIELDS
element.text: The field with the variables to be used for classification. It should be a string with the names of those fields separated by commas. Names are case-sensitive.

element.name: NUMCLASS
element.text: The number of classes to create.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer is identical to the input one, but contains an additional field in its attributes table, which indicates the group each point belongs to.
